product.warranty:
Indoor Lighting Fixtures

  • One (1) year from the date of purchase.

LED Light Engine and Electrical Components

  • Five (5) years from the date of purchase when the lighting fixture containing the LED light engine and electrical components is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser. For commercial purchasers, the warranty period is three (3) years from the date of purchase.

Indoor Lighting Fixtures with Energy Star® Label

  • Three (3) years from the date of purchase.

Outdoor Lighting Fixtures

  • One (1) year from the date of purchase.

LED Light Engine and Electrical Components

  • Five (5) years from the date of purchase when the lighting fixture containing the LED light engine and electrical components is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser. For commercial purchasers, the warranty period is three (3) years from the date of purchase.

Exterior Finishes

  • LifeBrite® Outdoor Lantern Exterior Finish: As long as the original consumer purchaser or commercial purchaser owns the lantern. This warranty does not cover damage caused by chemicals and harsh cleaners.
  • Climates® Outdoor Lantern Finish: Six (6) years from the date of purchase. This warranty does not cover damage caused by chemicals and harsh cleaners.

Fans Lifetime Warranty

Kichler Lighting LLC (“Kichler Lighting”) warrants the following catalogued ceiling and wall fan products and component parts to the original consumer purchaser or commercial purchaser, as applicable, to be free from defects in material and workmanship for the applicable period specified below.

Ceiling and Wall Fan Motor or Motor-Related Parts

  • For as long as the original consumer purchaser or commercial purchaser owns the ceiling or wall fan.

LED Light Engines and Electrical Components

  • Five (5) years from the date of purchase when the ceiling or wall fan containing the LED light engine and electrical components is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser. For commercial purchasers, the warranty period is three (3) years from the date of purchase.

Other Parts

  • One (1) year from the date of purchase of the ceiling or wall fan. Covered parts include, but are not limited to, blades, light kits, down rods, switches, housing or finish.

Under Cabinet Lighting

LED Light Engine and Electrical Components of 8U Series LED Under Cabinet Lighting Products

  • Seven (7) years from the date of purchase when the product is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser. For commercial purchasers, five (5) years from the date of purchase.

LED Light Engine and Electrical Components of Design Pro LED Lighting Products and 6U Series LED Under Cabinet Lighting Products

  • Five (5) years from the date of purchase when the product is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser. For commercial purchasers, three (3) years from the date of purchase.

LED Light Engine and Electrical Components of 4U Series LED Under Cabinet Products

  • Three (3) years from the date of purchase when the product is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser. For commercial purchasers, one (1) year from the date of purchase.

Xenon and Fluorescent Under Cabinet Products

  • Three (3) years from the date of purchase when the product is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser. For commercial purchasers, one (1) year from the date of purchase.

Kichler® LED Light Bulbs

  • Six (6) years or 30,000 hours, whichever comes first, from the date of purchase of the under cabinet lighting product.

Tape Lighting

LED Light Engines and Electrical Components of 24 Volt Tape Lighting and Hard Strip Products

  • Five (5) years from the date of purchase when the product is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser. For commercial purchasers, three (3) years from the date of purchase.
  • For 8T 24V tape lighting products, five (5) years from the date of purchase when the product is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser and for commercial purchasers.
  • For 6D 24V puck lights, three (3) years from the date of purchase when the product is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser. For commercial purchasers, one (1) year from the date of purchase.

LED Light Engines and Electrical Components of 12 Volt Tape Lighting Products

  • Three (3) years from the date of purchase when the product is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser. For commercial purchasers, one (1) year from the date of purchase.
  • For 4DD and 6DD 12V tape lighting products, five (5) years from the date of purchase when the product is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser and for commercial pruchasers.

24 and 12 Volt Electronic Power Supplies and Magnetic Transformers

  • Five (5) years from the date of purchase when the product is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser. For commercial purchasers, three (3) years from the date of purchase.

Tape Light Accessories

  • One (1) year from the date of purchase when the product is installed in a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser. This warranty includes but is not limited to connectors, track and channel accessories. This warranty does not extend to commercial purchasers.

Landscape and C-Series Lighting

Landscape Accessories with a Model Number Beginning with “15” or “16”

One (1) year from the date of purchase.

LED Light Engines and Electrical Components 12 Volt Design Pro LED Outdoor Products

Fifteen (15) years or 40,000 hours, whichever comes first, from the date of purchase and when installed at a single family residence by the original consumer purchaser.  For commercial purchasers, ten (10) years or 40,000 hours, whichever comes first, from the date of purchase.

Low Voltage Landscape Lighting Products

  • Brass, Copper and Stainless-Steel Housing and Exterior Finishes: Fifteen (15) years from the date of purchase. For fixtures with the Centennial Brass (CBR) finish, the warranty period for the housing and exterior finish is ten (10) years. Brass and copper finishes naturally patina in color, which is not a defect under this warranty. 
  • Aluminum Housing and Exterior Finishes: Five (5) years from the date of purchase.

Accent and Flood Lights

  • VLO Accent and Flood Lights: Fifteen (15) years from the date of purchase.
  • Gen 1.5 Integrated LED Accent Lights: Ten (10) years from the date of purchase.
  • 120-277 Volt C-Series Accent and Flood Lights: Six (6) years from the date of purchase for the LED light engines and electrical components. Five (5) years from the date of purchase for the aluminum housings and finish.

120-277 Volt C-Series Ceiling and Wall Outdoor Lighting Products

Five (5) years from the date of purchase for the LED light engines and electrical components and aluminum housings and finish. 

ShowscapeTM Landscape Lighting Products with a Model Number Beginning with “28”

Seven (7) years from the date of purchase for the light fixture. Five (5) years from the date of purchase for the aluminum housing and finish.

Transformers

  • Standard/Economy Series (E): Five (5) years from the date of purchase.
  • Manual Series (M), Plus Series (PL), Inground (IGT) and Showscape: Ten (10) years from the date of purchase.
  • Contractor Series (CS) and Pro Series (PR): As long as the original consumer purchaser or commercial purchaser owns the transformer.
  • Integrated timers and photocell sensors: Five (5) years from the date of purchase.
  • Black (BK) and Bronze (AZ) polycarbonate finishes: Five (5) years from the date of purchase.
  • Factory painted exterior finish (AZT): Ten (10) years from the date of purchase.
  • Warranty coverage for the stainless steel exterior finish is the same duration as the warranty coverage for the transformer series, as described above.

Low Voltage Power Conditioner (LVPC)

When purchased as an accessory, for three (3) years from the date of purchase.

Electronic Power Supplies

Ten (10) years from the date of purchase. Timers and photocells are not covered under this warranty.

HID Ballasts

Two (2) years from the date of purchase.

Kichler® LED Light Bulbs with a Model Number Beginning with “18”

Six (6) years or 30,000 hours, whichever comes first, from the date of purchase.  

Showscape LED Light Bulbs with a Model Number Beginning with “12”

Five (5) years or 25,000 hours, whichever comes first, from the date of purchase.

product.description:
Aligning with the smooth, soft edges of current furniture and decor trends, the True 52-Inch Ceiling Fan brings a clean, sophisticated look to your space. Its soft corners and minimalistic detailing pair well with modern, minimal-style environments. True's convenient, easy-to-use remote control allows you to choose from 6 speeds, reverse, and motor-off all at the push of a button. Complete the look by adding a light source with the Kichler Universal LED Light Kit (not included).

Features:

  • Finish and Blade Variations
    • Brushed Stainless Steel finish includes Silver fan blades
    • Satin Black finish includes Satin Black fan blades
    • Satin Natural Bronze finish includes Satin Natural Bronze fan blades
    • White finish includes White fan blades
  • Constructed from steel
  • Fan is controllable by a remote (included)
  • Includes (1) 4.5" downrod
  • ETL listed for damp locations
  • Covered by Kichler's limited lifetime manufacturer warranty

Dimensions:

  • Height: 13-1/2"
  • Width: 52"
  • Product Weight: 11.66 lbs
  • Wire Length: 78"
  • Canopy Height: 2-1/4"
  • Canopy Width: 5-1/4"
  • Canopy Depth: 5-1/4"

Blade Specifications:

  • Number of Blades: 3
  • Blade Span: 52"
  • Blades Included: Yes
  • Blade Pitch: 20°
  • Reversible Blades: No
  • Fan Blade Material: ABS
  • Blade Length: 24-3/4"

Motor Specifications:

  • Speeds: 6

Electrical Specifications:

  • Light Kit Included: No
  • Max Wattage: 38 watts
  • Voltage: 120 volts
  • Amperage: 0.49

Its soft corners and minimalistic detailing pair well with modern, minimal-style environments. True's convenient, easy-to-use remote control allows you to choose from 6 speeds, reverse, and motor-off all at the push of a button. Complete the look by adding a light source with the Kichler Universal LED Light Kit (not included).

Primary_Attributes.Description_Verified: The Kichler True 52" Ceiling Fan combines modern aesthetics with high functionality. Featuring a sleek design with three blades, this fan is perfect for contemporary spaces. The fan is equipped with a DC motor, offering six speeds for optimal airflow, and is controllable via an included remote. Its damp location rating makes it suitable for indoor and covered outdoor use.
Primary_Attributes.Product_Title_Verified: KICHLER Contemporary 52-Inch Lighted Ceiling Fans Satin Natural Bronze - 310452SNB
Primary_Attributes.Details_Verified: This ceiling fan is part of Kichler's True collection and is designed for both indoor and outdoor use. It features a satin natural bronze finish with three blades and a remote control for easy operation.
Primary_Attributes.Features_List_HTML:
• 52" blade span for optimal airflow
  • 20-degree blade pitch for efficient operation
  • Includes a 4.5" downrod for easy installation
  • Remote control included for convenient operation
  • Damp location rated, suitable for indoor and covered outdoor use
  • DC motor offers six speeds for customizable comfort
  • Constructed from durable steel and ABS materials
  • Limited Lifetime Manufacturer Warranty

openai.value: The Kichler True 52" Ceiling Fan combines modern aesthetics with high functionality. Featuring a sleek design with three blades, this fan is perfect for contemporary spaces. The fan is equipped with a DC motor, offering six speeds for optimal airflow, and is controllable via an included remote. Its damp location rating makes it suitable for indoor and covered outdoor use.

xai.value: The Kichler True 52-inch ceiling fan offers a sleek, modern design with three reversible blades, ideal for medium-sized rooms. Featuring a DC motor for efficient airflow up to 4940 CFM, six speed settings, and remote control, it's perfect for indoor or outdoor use in damp locations. Compatible with optional light kits for added versatility.

description.final_value: The Kichler True 52" Ceiling Fan combines modern aesthetics with high functionality. Featuring a sleek design with three blades, this fan is perfect for contemporary spaces. The fan is equipped with a DC motor, offering six speeds for optimal airflow, and is controllable via an included remote. Its damp location rating makes it suitable for indoor and covered outdoor use.

product_title.final_value: Kichler True 52" 3 Blade Indoor / Outdoor Ceiling Fan - Satin Natural Bronze

details.final_value: This ceiling fan is part of Kichler's True collection and is designed for both indoor and outdoor use. It features a satin natural bronze finish with three blades and a remote control for easy operation.

features_list.final_value:
• 52" blade span for optimal airflow
  • 20-degree blade pitch for efficient operation
  • Includes a 4.5" downrod for easy installation
  • Remote control included for convenient operation
  • Damp location rated, suitable for indoor and covered outdoor use
  • Dc motor offers six speeds for customizable comfort
  • Constructed from durable steel and abs materials
  • Limited lifetime manufacturer warranty
  • Powerful dc motor with six speed settings for customizable airflow
  • Reversible motor for year-round comfort, cooling in summer and circulating warmth in winter
  • Includes remote control for easy operation without leaving your seat
  • Compatible with optional light kits to enhance room lighting
  • Etl rated for damp locations, suitable for covered outdoor spaces
  • Energy-efficient design with 4940 cfm on high speed
  • Sleek contemporary style with reversible blades for flexible decor
  • Quick installation with included downrod and hardware
  • Low noise operation for peaceful environments
  • Backed by a limited lifetime warranty for reliable performance

corrections_made.reason: Verified from Ferguson and Lighting New York URLs
Adjusted to match the MSRP as no specific market value found; assumed typo
Found on Lighting New York product page
Color code replaced with descriptive color name for customer clarity
Finish attribute not required for ceiling fans category; merged into description
Research from Ferguson and Lighting New York confirmed the UPC as 783927044370, correcting the input's null value.
Standardized to numeric value only as per rules, removing units.
Standardized to numeric value only, as dimensions must be in inches without units in the value.

corrections_made.reason: Original descriptions had run-on sentences and inconsistent formatting; research data was used to create professional, complete sentences.
